article: jerusalem , february ## -lrb- xinhua -rrb- - israeli defense minister moshe arens has decided to hold a review with senior officers on the strategy of israeli army in south lebanon within a few days , a senior defense official said on wednesday .
abstract: israeli dm to review strategy in southern lebanon
